mapper.select: SELECT t.reverseauction_no, t.reverseauction_tender_no, g.guestroom_option_no, g.guestroom_option_name, t.reverseauction_tender_price, r.reverseauction_rooming_date, r.reverseauction_leaving_date FROM ((reverseauction_tender t LEFT JOIN reverseauction_register r ON t.reverseauction_no = r.reverseauction_no) LEFT JOIN guestroom_option g ON t.guestroom_no = g.guestroom_no) WHERE t.reverseauction_tender_no=#{reverseacutionTenderNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reverseauction_successfulbid( reverseauction_successfulbid_no, reverseauction_no, reverseauction_tender_no, guestroom_option_no, guestroom_option_name, guestroom_additional_price, reverseauction_successfulbid_price, reverseauction_successfulbid_date, reverseauction_rooming_date, reverseauction_leaving_date, auction_state_category_no, auction_state_category_name) VALUES( 0, #{reverseauctionNo}, #{reverseauctionTenderNo}, #{guestroomOptionNo}, null, #{guestroomOptionName}, #{guestroomAdditionalPrice}, #{reverseauctionSuccessfulbidPrice}, now(), #{reverseauctionRoomingDate}, #{reverseauctionLeavingDate}, 2, "낙찰완료")
